trans-unit.source: 3D scientific data visualization library and application
trans-unit.target: 三维科学数据可视化库及应用

trans-unit.source: A GUI toolkit, either PyQt4, PySide, PySide2, PyQt5 or wxPython.
trans-unit.target: 一个GUI工具箱，可以是PyQt4，PySide，PySide2，PyQt5或wxPython。

trans-unit.source: Add the jupyter nbextensions using the instructions in the section above and you should be good to go.
trans-unit.target: 使用上面部分的说明添加jupyter nbextensions,就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Additionally Mayavi strives to be a reusable tool that can be embedded in your applications in different ways or combined with the envisage application-building framework to assemble domain-specific tools.
trans-unit.target: 此外,Mayavi努力成为一个可重用的工具,它可以以不同的方式嵌入到你的应用中,或者与envisage应用构建框架相结合,组装特定领域的工具。

trans-unit.source: By itself Mayavi is not a difficult package to install but its dependencies are unfortunately rather heavy. However, many of these dependencies are now available as wheels on PyPI. The two critical dependencies are,
trans-unit.target: Mayavi 本身并不是一个很难安装的包,但不幸的是,它的依赖性相当重。然而,这些依赖性现在在PyPI上都可以作为轮子使用。两个关键的依赖项是

trans-unit.source: Convenient functionality for rapid scientific plotting via mlab (see mlab documentation)
trans-unit.target: 方便地通过mlab进行快速科学绘图的功能(见mlab文档)

trans-unit.source: Core contributors:
trans-unit.target: 核心贡献者:

trans-unit.source: Currently, Mayavi itself should work with the new wxPython 4.x. However, traitsui, pyface, and other ETS packages do not yet support it so the UI will not work correctly. Older versions should work. PyQt/PySide/PySide2 should work largely out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 当前，Mayavi本身应与新的wxPython 4.x一起使用。但是， traitsui，pyface和其他ETS软件包尚不支持它，因此UI无法正常工作。旧版本应该可以。PyQt / PySide / PySide2应该开箱即用。

trans-unit.source: Deepak Surti: Upgrade to VTK 5.10.1, VTK 6.x with new pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Deepak Surti:升级到VTK 5.10.1,VTK 6.x的新管道。

trans-unit.source: If you are new to mayavi it is a good idea to read the online user manual which should introduce you to how to install and use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉mayavi，最好阅读在线用户手册 ，该手册将向您介绍如何安装和使用它。

trans-unit.source: If you are unable to do this, read the documentation above and find a way to install VTK and a suitable UI toolkit and then repeat the above.
trans-unit.target: 如果你无法做到这一点,请阅读上面的文档,想办法安装VTK和合适的UI工具包,然后再重复上面的操作。

trans-unit.source: If you have questions you could ask on the Mayavi-users mailing list. This is used by some folks and is not too active. Another mailing list that may be of use is the ETS Users mailing list. This is a more general list where a lot of folks experienced with the Enthought Tool Suite are available.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有任何疑问，可以在Mayavi-users邮件列表中询问。这是一些人使用的，不太活跃。另一个可能有用的邮件列表是ETS用户邮件列表。这是一个更一般的列表，其中提供了许多使用Enthought Tool Suite经验的人。

trans-unit.source: Mayavi is a general purpose, cross-platform tool for 2-D and 3-D scientific data visualization. Its features include:
trans-unit.target: Mayavi是一款通用的、跨平台的二维和三维科学数据可视化工具。其特点包括:

trans-unit.source: Mayavi is part of the Enthought Tool Suite (ETS).
trans-unit.target: Mayavi是Enthought工具套件(ETS)的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Mayavi seeks to provide easy and interactive visualization of 3D data. It does this by the following:
trans-unit.target: Mayavi旨在提供简单和交互式的3D数据可视化。它通过以下方式来实现。

trans-unit.source: More documentation in the form of workshop/tutorial material is available here:
trans-unit.target: 更多研讨会/辅导材料形式的文件可在这里获得。

trans-unit.source: More documentation is available in the online user manual or in
trans-unit.target: 更多的文档是可用的在线用户手册或

trans-unit.source: On Python 3.x you will need to install PyQt5 and wheels are available for this. On 2.7.x you have more options, and can use PySide, PyQt4, and wxPython. These can be installed from pip or from your package manager.
trans-unit.target: 在Python 3.x上，您将需要安装PyQt5，并且可以使用轮子。在2.7.x上，您有更多选择，并且可以使用PySide，PyQt4和 wxPython。这些可以从pip或程序包管理器安装。

trans-unit.source: Patches from many people (see the release notes), including K K Rai and R A Ambareesha for tensor support, parametric source and image data.
trans-unit.target: 来自许多人的补丁(见发布说明),包括K K Rai和R A Ambareesha的张量支持、参数源和图像数据。

trans-unit.source: Prabhu Ramachandran: primary author.
trans-unit.target: Prabhu Ramachandran:主要作者。

trans-unit.source: The bug tracker is available in github Please provide info and details on platform, python, vtk and gui backends and their versions. If possible, a small example replicating the the problem.
trans-unit.target: 可以在github中找到该错误跟踪器。请提供有关平台，python，vtk和gui后端及其版本的信息和详细信息。如果可能，请使用一个小示例来复制问题。

trans-unit.source: The integration tests:
trans-unit.target: 集成测试。

trans-unit.source: The latest VTK wheels are available on all the major platforms (Windows, MacOS, and Linux), but only for 64 bit machines. Python 3.x is fully supported on all these operating systems and Python 2.7.x on MacOS and Linux. If you are out of luck, and your platform is not supported then you will need to install VTK yourself using your particular distribution as discussed in the General Build and Installation instructions
trans-unit.target: 在所有主要平台（Windows，MacOS和Linux）上都可以使用最新的VTK轮，但仅适用于64位计算机。所有这些操作系统都完全支持Python 3.x，而MacOS和Linux上则完全支持Python2.7.x。如果您不走运，并且不支持您的平台，那么您将需要使用自己的特定发行版自行安装VTK，如《一般构建和安装说明》中所述

trans-unit.source: Tutorial Videos
trans-unit.target: 视频教程

trans-unit.source: Unlike its predecessor MayaVi1, Mayavi has been designed with scriptability and extensibility in mind from the ground up. While the mayavi2 application is usable by itself, it may be used as an Envisage plugin which allows it to be embedded in user applications natively. Alternatively, it may be used as a visualization engine for any application.
trans-unit.target: 与之前的MayaVi1不同，Mayavi从一开始就考虑了脚本性和可扩展性。尽管mayavi2应用程序本身可以使用，但它可以用作Envisage插件，从而允许将其本机嵌入用户应用程序中。或者，它可用作任何应用程序的可视化引擎。

trans-unit.source: Visualization of scalar, vector and tensor data in 2 and 3 dimensions
trans-unit.target: 二维和三维的标量、矢量和张量数据的可视化。

trans-unit.source: You will also need to have ipywidgets and ipyevents installed. These can be installed via pip or your favorite package manager.
trans-unit.target: 您还需要安装ipywidgets和ipyevents。这些可以通过pip或您喜欢的软件包管理器进行安装。

trans-unit.source: a simple and clean scripting interface in Python, including one-liners, a-la mlab, or object-oriented programming interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单干净的Python脚本界面,包括单行本、a-la mlab或面向对象的编程界面。

trans-unit.source: an (optional) rich user interface with dialogs to interact with all data and objects in the visualization.
trans-unit.target: 一个(可选)丰富的用户界面,通过对话框与可视化中的所有数据和对象进行交互。

trans-unit.target: 应用程序,也可以运行实例目录下的任何一个实例。
